author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves establishing the ability to analyze macOS Mach-O files. This includes implementing mechanisms to dissect, interpret, and analyze the structure and content of Mach-O files, which are the executable file format used in macOS and iOS operating systems. It is essential for malware analysis, software development, and security assessments, providing insights into the behavior and characteristics of macOS applications.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.
File system access and forensic tools for file analysis and manipulation.

title: Establish Ability to Analyze macOS Mach-O

references.name: NIST SP 800-137: Information Security Continuous Monitoring (ISCM)
MITRE ATT&CK: Discovery Tactics and Detection Strategies
CISA Zero Trust Architecture - Monitoring and Analytics
